snippet: The governor plans to create a commission that aims to enhance teacher accountability and student achievement.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo, in his State of the State address, pledges to wage a campaign to put New York schools first, creating a commission aimed at enhancing teacher accountability and student achievement.
lead_paragraph: The governor plans to create a commission that aims to enhance teacher accountability and student achievement.

headline.seo: Cuomo Vows New Push to Improve Schools
headline.main: Cuomo Vows New Push to Improve Education
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Vows New Push To Improve Education
